DOC.brief_title: Impact Whey Soy Protein Ingestion Conjunction With Energy Restriction Overweight/Obese Individuals
DOC.criteria: Aged 35 55 year old Moderately Obese/Overweight ( body mass index > 25 < 42 kg/m2 ) Healthy Nonsmoker Suffer type 2 diabetes , hyperlipidemia , thyroid dysfunction Taking medication Having unstable weight past 46 month , diet time past 6 month Taking weight loss product aid ( include energy drink )
